author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is a technical update of the GTs:
- Adds new ECAL TPG double weights tags as requested in [this HN post](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4387.html) and further detailed in [this presentation at the AlCaDB meeting](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1020767/contributions/4284465/attachments/2217442/3754331/21_03_29%20-AlcaDB%20meeting%20-%20double%20weights%20CMSSW%20integration.pdf).
  - Since the tags are now included in the GTs I removed ` SimCalorimetry/EcalTrigPrimProducers/python/ecalTrigPrimESDoubleWeights_cff.py` and updated `SimCalorimetry/EcalTrigPrimProducers/python/ecalTriggerPrimitiveDigis_cff.py`
- Removes the `GEMELMapRcd` tag from all the GTs as requested in [this HN post](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4368.html).

GTs diff:
**Run 1 design**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/113X_mcRun1_design_v2/113X_mcRun1_design_v3

**Run 1 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/113X_mcRun1_realistic_v2/113X_mcRun1_realistic_v3

**Run 1 heavy ion**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/113X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v2/113X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v3

https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/113X_mcRun1_pA_v2/113X_mcRun1_pA_v3

**Run 2 startup**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/113X_mcRun2_startup_v2/113X_mcRun2_startup_v3

#### PR validation:
Tested with:
`runTheMatrix.py -l limited,140.0,1325.516,7.22,145.0,281.0,136.8642,138.2,138.1,10424.0,7.21,11224.0,250200.182,11024.2,7.4,12034.0,7.23,159.0,12834.0 --ibeos -j 9`

#### Backport
This PR is not a backport but will be backported to 113X.
title: Add ECAL TPG double weight tags and remove GEMELMapRcd from GTs
